pr_title: Adding support for SSL dual mode (#712)

timeline.author: hardik-k-shah

replies.bodyText:
This numbering is with respect to DEFAULT_MASTER_WITHOUT_SECURITY_PLUGIN and DEFAULT_ONE_DATA_NODE_WITHOUT_SECURITY_PLUGIN defined in ClusterConfiguration.
These enums define a 3 node cluster with 1 node not having the security plugin.
in ES 6.x cluster the node numbering seems to be in a reverse order compared to ES 7.x cluster, which why had to do this change for ES 6.x plugins
replies.author: sachetalva

timeline.message:
Adding support for SSL dual mode (#712)

* Adding SSL dual mode support for SSLOnly

(cherry picked from commit 27f33fb)

Co-authored-by: Vengadanathan Srinivasan <vengadan@amazon.com>
Fix for EIT migration test failure
